## News and important dates

Optional Hinweis auf RIA Infoveranstaltungen: https://www.fau.de/education/international/wege-ins-ausland/erste-schritte-zum-auslandsaufenthalt/informationsveranstaltungen/   (wird in Kürze aktualisiert) -->

For the academic year 2024/2025, Communication Science students have the opportunity to study at various partner universities of the [Chair of Communication Science](https://www.commsci.rw.fau.eu/) in other European countries as part of the ERASMUS program. Please take note of the following important dates:

-   05.11.2024 - [Presentation](slides/international_day.html) as part of the [International Day](https://www.wiso-international-day.fau.de/)
-   15.11.2024 - Activation of the online application
-   05.12.2024 - Application deadline

::: callout-note

## Partner universities

```{r session-setup}
#| echo: false
#| message: false

if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(
    readr, qs,
    here, tidyverse, 
    leaflet, raster, 
    osmdata, osmextract,
    glue,
    gt,
    gtExtras
)
```

```{r optional-create-new-qs-data}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
source(here("R/data-creation.r"))
```

```{r import-db}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
df_en <- qread(here("data/universities-geo_locations_en.qs"))
```

```{r create-icons}
#| echo: false
#| column: page
#| fig-align: center
icons <- awesomeIcons(
    markerColor = "darkblue"
)

leaflet(df_en) %>%
    addTiles() %>% 
    addAwesomeMarkers(~long, ~lat, popup = ~info, icon = icons) 
```

```{r create-icons-troubleshooting}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
invalid_rows <- which(!validUTF8(df_en$info))

# Zeige problematische Zeilen an
df_en[invalid_rows, ]
df_en$info <- iconv(df_en$info, from = "unknown", to = "UTF-8", sub = "byte")
unique(Encoding(df_en$info))
# Finde Zeilen mit "unknown" Kodierung
unknown_encoding_rows <- which(Encoding(df_en$info) == "unknown")

# Zeige die betroffenen Zeilen an
df_en[unknown_encoding_rows, ]
df_en$info <- iconv(df_en$info, from = "windows-1252", to = "UTF-8", sub = "byte")
```

```{r create-table}
#| echo: false
#| column: page

library(gt)

df_en %>%
    mutate(
        duration = paste(duration, "months", sep = " "),
        uni_link = glue("[{uni}]({link})"),
        uni_link = map(uni_link, gt::md)
    ) %>% 
    dplyr::select(country, uni_link, places:languages, wise:sose) %>% 
    gt::gt(id = "table_1") %>% 
    cols_label(
        country = "country",
        uni_link = "University", 
        places = "places",
        duration = "duration of exchange",
        languages = "Courses available in",
        wise = "winter term",
        sose = "summer term"
    ) %>% 
    gtExtras::gt_highlight_rows(
        rows = c(7, 10, 12),
        fill = "#18B4F1", 
        alpha = 0.075,
        font_weight = "normal",
        bold_target_only = FALSE
    ) %>%
    tab_footnote(
    footnote = "only BA students",
    placement = "right", 
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = 3, row = c(7, 10, 12))
    ) %>% 
    gtExtras::gt_theme_538()

```
